profile.name: Jitendra Prajapat
profile.headline: Bridging Silicon & Soil
profile.bio: By day, I guide students to break and rebuild technology. By night, I tend to the soil. I believe the most complex code often mimics the simplicity of nature.

tech.title: The Professor
tech.description: Researching AI for Tuberculosis diagnosis and teaching Cybersecurity to the next generation.

soil.title: The Farmer
soil.description: Rooted in Rajasthan, using technology to solve water crises and preserving Ayurvedic traditions.

timeline.desc: Leading curriculum innovation in AI, UX, and Industry 4.0.
Designed AI/IoT water monitoring solutions for 200+ rural households.
Managed critical IT ecosystems for healthcare, ensuring 24/7 uptime.
Researching 'Use of AI in Healthcare' for early diagnosis.
